LightningComponentBundle.description: Native Salesforce related list component using Lightning Data Service - automatically uses page layout configuration

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record ID
property.description: The parent record ID. Use {!recordId} for dynamic record pages.

property.name: relatedListId
property.label: Related List API Name
property.description: API name of the related list as configured in the page layout. Examples: 'Tasks', 'Events', 'Internal_Asset_Request__c', 'ContactRoles', 'Cases'

property.name: relatedListLabel
property.label: Custom Label (Optional)
property.description: Override the default related list label. Leave blank to use the label from page layout configuration.

property.name: recordLimit
property.label: Records to Display
property.description: Number of records to show before 'View All' button. Default is 6.
